statistics.name: endless_hero_level
statistics.description: The max hero level a player reaches on a single endless map.

statistics.name: endless_time
statistics.description: The max amount of time (in seconds) a player survives on an endless map

statistics.name: story_easy
statistics.description: The number of story chapters a player has completed on easy or above (0 - 8)

statistics.name: story_hard
statistics.description: The number of story chapters a player has completed on hard (0 - 8)

accomplishment_tasks.name: All Story Missions Completed on Hard Difficulty

statistics.name: story_normal
statistics.description: The number of story chapters a player has completed on normal or above (0 - 8)

statistics.name: total_endless_hero_level
statistics.description: The sum of the total hero level a player has achieved across all 8 endless maps.

statistics.name: total_endless_time
statistics.description: The total amount of time a player has survived across all 8 endless maps.
